description: These nutritious Greek-inspired vegan meatballs are super filling and perfect served with pita breads and hummus.
name: Greek-Style Quinoa & Bean Meatballs Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the rest of the oil in the pan and cook the meatballs for 4-5 minutes, tossing to brown all over. Place the meatballs on a baking sheet and bake for 18-20 minutes.
